website_summaries.verdict: Tag Team cards made their debut in the Sun & Moon Team Up set, and these 40-card collectible tins have never made it easier to collect your favorite Pokémon team-ups.
pros: Includes holofoil Celebi & Venusaur-GX card, 40 random cards, a metal game piece, and a storage tin featuring the legendary team-up
Themed Pikachu & Zekrom-GX and Eevee & Snorlax-GX tins also available
cons: Although you only get one Tag Team card, at least you’ll know which incredibly rare holofoil Tag Team card you’re getting when you select a tin!

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Only 2 of the 4 booster packs were team up packs
customer_reviews.text: I suppose if you looked hard enough you could have potentially found out that not all four packs would be from the Team Up set, but why on earth would you expect that without doing detective work? Felt very misleading and like a bait n switch. My kids had no interest in the other two sets and it felt very deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy. This was an excellent set for him. He loves this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Rabidus Matris

customer_reviews.title: Tag Team Art is fire
customer_reviews.text: This, set is alright most people who play tcg will enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Lytle

customer_reviews.title: TIN ARRIVED DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Tin arrived bent and scratched. My grandson was so excited to get it I didn't have the heart to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The shown card is highly overpowered, the packs inside have a good pull, and the metal GX token is nice. Highly recomend for grass type players and collectors alike.
customer_reviews.author: Lavi

customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a person in another state. I cannot rate their satisfaction. I indicated 3 stars because the Amazon email required a rating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Got what I ordered, NOT pre-opened
customer_reviews.text: Got good cards, not re-opened, came on time... not much more to say
customer_reviews.author: Graidey Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not what was on the image.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and a different set of cards showed up. I got Snorlax. It wasn’t even the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he loved it New Pokémon cards added to his collection
customer_reviews.author: Jose andrade

customer_reviews.title: Everything still sealed
customer_reviews.text: Product came in tact and is exactly as advertised thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan mccray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Tin was in perfect condition, wrapped up and undamaged. Great pulls as well. Very well-priced, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Nora M.

customer_reviews.title: bad cards
customer_reviews.text: it was oviestly gone through the best card I got did 100 damage do not buy
customer_reviews.author: deirdre

customer_reviews.title: love these tins!
customer_reviews.text: Only four packs but the tin is so large you can hold so many cards inside safely. Very collectable tins and I had a good pull. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing! I got a full art trainer. I got a ultra rare mega blastoise But when I got the main card it was cut the right side was cut. But you can still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuvarajan Jayraman

customer_reviews.title: Good camp gift
customer_reviews.text: I sent them to my grandson. He was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Rosenzweig

customer_reviews.title: Zero Team Up packs! Completely Misleading tin!
customer_reviews.text: Literally none of the packs inside were Team Up! How can you sell a Team Up tin without any of the namesake packs included. This was extremely misleading, I don't even know how they could claim to sell it in this manner. The only upside was the promo was in good condition, but the rest was not as advertised. It had Crimson Invasion, Steam Siege, Sun & Moon, and Burning Shadows. I've also never made a 1 star review in my life and I've probably used Amazon every day for the last 5+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Carbone

customer_reviews.title: Scam! Repackaged packs!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! This tin is resealed It originally came with 2 team ups, evolutions and forbidden light. this tin is repackaged with crimson invasion, burning shadows, sun &moon and Steam siege
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was four packs of team up but it's a mix
customer_reviews.text: I thought this tin came with four packs of team up but out of the four I only got two team ups, one evolutions, and one forbidden light. If I had known it was a mix I would not have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: KrumBum

customer_reviews.title: Promo is legit but otherwise scam
customer_reviews.text: Product was most likely resealed as I didn’t receive a single Team Up pack nor any other packs that should have been in there (Forbidden light and Evolutions). The condition of the tin and the promo were legit so that’s why it isn’t a 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY if you are expecting Tag Team Booster Packs
customer_reviews.text: Not even one of the packs were Tag Team booster packs. It suspected me to believe these are resealed products.
customer_reviews.author: Ruiz-Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Tin was tampered with. Didn't come with any team up booster pack's.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Artwork of the Team Up Promo
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this tin! They include a large, metal GX flip piece which is so much nicer than the standard, plastic ones. The artwork is SO AWESOME! I love battling with this Team Up duo so I had to get this version of the card. I pulled a Full Art trainer, see pictured, in one of the 4 packs. Great tin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the right one
customer_reviews.text: I received the Snorlax and Eevee tag team instead of this one that I ordered. It was a gift, and I didn't think he cared all that much which one he got, so I kept it and he was happy. However, it was not the one I had intended to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Me3hMeRz

customer_reviews.title: Scammed
customer_reviews.text: A ordered the tin and I got a 1 TeamUp booster pack and nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Man

product_meta.title: Pokemon Tag Team Tin Celebi & Venusaur-GX- TCG: Sun & Moon Box- 4 Booster Packs | 1 Foil Art Celebi & Venusaur-GX Foil Card
product_meta.description: Color:1 Special Art Celebi & Venusaur-gx Foil CardA tag team can be stronger than a Pokémon battling solo! Celebi & venusaur-gx are the stars of this Pokémon Trading Card Game: tag team tin. Each tin contains an amazing pair of Pokémon who work together perfectly as a teammate a GX attack that can leave opponents in the dust!
feature_bullets: 1 foil tag team Pokémon-GX with special art (Celebi & Venusaur-gx)
A code card to unlock a playable deck in the Pokémon trading Card game online
Each sun & Moon Series booster pack contains 10 cards and 1 basic energy
Each XY series booster pack includes 10 cards

specifications.Color: 1 Special Art Celebi & Venusaur-gx Foil Card
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars172 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
